toolTip
service in module tide-angular

Description

Generates a tooltip element that will be shown at the mouse position It displays a message generated by message function, which can be overidden

Use: example.directive("myDirective",["toolTip",function (tooltip) { var myTooltip = tooltip(); mytooTip.message(function(d) { var msg = "Name: " + d.name; return msg; })

(...) d3selection .on("mouseenter", function(d) { mytooTip.show(d); }) .on("mouseleave", function() { mytooTip.hide(); });

Dependencies

  • d3
